(Hope I got everyone's attacks down.  They were scattered on the web 
site so it was hard to get them all and keep track.  Anyone know 
where JP is?  Probably letting my guys do all the dirty work that 
SOB...)

(Ok, this is for the stuff I sure as hell didn't agree with.  
Alloran, Ratchet and Bluestreak are firing upon Zergling and Punch, 
and those two Alliance members are inside the Ark.  The two Maximals 
I mentioned of yours NEVER entered the Ark.

Stomper jump kicked at Punch, yet he was never in the Ark, Icedemon.  
Also, my guys aren't standing around near an entry hatch in the Ark, 
but I'll let that slide

Also, Minime...isn't Fliq a Maximal?  And if so...why is Bronco 
shooting him?)

The Oblitercons/Serpentor/Unitron/Punch/Zergling/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot:




Dark One barrel rolled, dodging several blasts.  Getting a target 
lock, he fired down a heat seeking missile at Archangel, followed up 
by 10 rapid laser blasts.

---

Breakdown fired off a grenade at Torca

---

Hiss cursed, rolling, a fire ball hitting his left arm.  He raised 
his missile launcher, firing a rocket at Archangel's sternum, shaking 
his arm violently.

---

Scavenger fell back, his chest plate slightly cracking.  He raised 
his chain gun, firing off 12 armor piercing rounds at Torca's torso.

---

Pyro laughed evilly, firing off two fire balls at Ratchet's knees.

---

Oinker ducked under a few optic lasers, one piercing into his left 
shoulder.  He fired off three laser bolts at Shadow Wing.

------

Hearing the scream of missiles, Zergling jumped back, Punch holding 
him up, the missiles blowing up against a wall in front of them.  
They ran down the corridor, slipping into a room, the engine room.

Zergling raised his weapon, firing off a total of 25 rapid laser 
bolts in an arc in front of him.  (I don't want to post what the 
Ark's engine room looks like, since I've never seen it)

Punch raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at machinery.
